examples.korean: Fame can be a two-edged sword. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 명성은 양날의 칼이 될 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Fame can be a two-edged sword. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Education is like a double-edged sword. It may be turned to dangerous uses if it is not properly handled. (Wu Ting-Fang) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육은 양날의 칼과 같다. 제대로 다루지 못하면 위험한 용도로 쓰일 수 있다. (우 팅-팡, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Education is like a double-edged sword. It may be turned to dangerous uses if it is not properly handled. (Wu Ting-Fang) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The suggestion that costs should be shared cuts both ways. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 비용은 분담해야 한다는 의견은 양날의 검이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The suggestion that costs should be shared cuts both ways. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The suggestion that rush costs should be shared cuts both ways. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 퀵서비스 비용은 분담해야 한다는 의견은 양날의 검이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The suggestion that rush costs should be shared cuts both ways. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The clear answer to the problems depends on how to balance issues such as economic growth and quality of life on the edge of a double-edged sword called 'Demographic growth.' 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 문제에 대한 분명한 해답은 경제 성장과 삶의 질과 같은 이슈를 '인구성장'이라는 양날의 칼날 위에서 어떻게 균형을 잡느냐에 달려 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The clear answer to the problems depends on how to balance issues such as economic growth and quality of life on the edge of a double-edged sword called 'Demographic growth.' Add to Wordbook
